post.author: Sonia
post.content:
You can contact him to get an opportunity.
====================================================================
VTRAC Corporation
Solutions for Growth

Please e-mail your resume as Ms-Word attached document in confidence to: Alex Severin at davidm@vtrac.com or call: (416) 366-2600 x 222
Position: Sr. Oracle DBA with DB2 Production Support (Job # 1879)
Position Type: Permanent
Location: Toronto

Major Activities:

- Participate in the design, engineering, configuration, testing, and performance tuning of all data warehouse and very large database environments.
- Coordinate and oversee ongoing maintenance and upgrades for all data warehouse DBMS's with internal teams and external service providers
- Provide rigorous testing for new DBMS releases and patches, configuration changes, indexing strategies, maintenance routines, upgrade and data migration strategies, data distribution (replication) strategies, extraction-transformation-load strategies, high availability strategies, disaster recovery, and other application design strategies.
- Provide project oversight for large-scale complex database application changes and implementation.
- Actively provide leadership and technical expertise to ongoing problem identification/resolution and root cause analysis process for data warehousing environment:
- As a Level 3 escalation resource for problem determination and resolution of all issues encountered during development, quality assurance and user acceptance testing, production system integration, and all issues escalated by Level 1 and Level 2 Command Center staff post-production.
- Participates as a team member in evaluating system resource utilization and storage usage/capacity, and makes recommendations to increase application performance to meet business and financial requirements.

Requirements:
- Strong verbal, written communications, and listening skills
- Strong team player with the ability to build relationships across work units
- Project leadership and guidance experience
- Strong customer service skills and follow-up
- Ability to demonstrate leadership, accountability, and initiative relating to all job responsibilities
- Exceptional problem determination, troubleshooting, and resolution skills
- Ability to mentor team members and provide ongoing knowledge transfer relating technology evolution, troubleshooting techniques, and automation
- Process oriented in change and problem management disciplines
- Working experience and/or familiarity with the following technologies:
- DBMS Database Server Products
- Oracle Database Enterprise Edition, versions 8i , 9i, and 10g
- Operating Systems
- Sun Solaris 2.6, 2.8, & 2.9

- DB2- important to have
- IBM AIX
- Windows NT & 2000
-?Database Management Utilities
- DBArtisan
- BMC Patrol
- HP Openview DBSPIs
- Oracle Enterprise Manager Diagnostic Pack, Tuning Pack
- Veritas NetBackup For Oracle
- Business Intelligence Tools
- Oracle Enterprise Edition Option Packs (OLAP, Data Mining)
- Cognos
- Enterprise Modeling Tools
- ERWIN
- High Availability Solutions
- Veritas Cluster Server Manager
- Oracle Real Application Clusters
- Geo-clustering
- Data Warehouse Solutions
- Oracle Express Server, Express Analyzer, Express Objects
- Sybase Adaptive Server IQ
- Middleware
- Open Systems Gateways
- Informatica
- Strong familiarity with Local Area and Wide Area network topology
- FTP, TFTP, Traceroute, Ping

Attributes:
- Analytical/Systematic Thinker
- Results Orientation
- Agile/Adaptable
- Relationship Building
- Leading Others
- Accountability

Knowledge Transfer:
- Ability to disseminate knowledge to other Specialist Team members and Command Centre Database Support Team members (peer-level communication and knowledge transfer)
- Ability to interact and collaborate with senior-level engineering and architecture staff members on concepts, planning, and new technical policies and procedures.

Qualifications:
Minimum 8 years experience with the design, engineering, configuration, testing, and support of small, midrange, and large scale DBMS implementations. Proven experience supporting VLDB and data warehousing environments exceeding 1 Terabyte in size. Proven expert knowledge of:

1. Oracle Database Administration and Design
2. Detailed knowledge of general Unix, Windows and Network utilities
3. Oracle Certification(s)

Nice to have/Exposure to:
HP Openview
CA Autosys/Tivoli TWS, other automated cross platform work/job schedulers
Ethernet networking
TCP/IP network Protocol and functions/utilities (e.g. ping/traceroute)
DNS/DHCP Knowledge
Windows NT/2000 Server
MS Office (97 & 2000) and Internet Explorer
MS Outlook
EMC SAN technology
NetAppliance
Informatica
Weblogic




David Milnes
Recruitment Consultant
VTRAC Consulting Corporation
t:  (416) 366-2600 x 222
f:  (416) 366-5550
davidm@vtrac.com

366 Bay Street, Suite 500
Toronto, Ontario, Canada
M5H 4B2
www.vtrac.com
Solutions for Growth
post.title: Oracle DBA Job Opportunity
